[All] Revert Parcel upgrade to prevent maximum callstack errors (#575)

The latest version of Parcel we were using was causing maximum callstack errors in our bundled code.

I've created a Github issue for them here: https://github.com/parcel-bundler/parcel/issues/6051

In the meantime we have reverted and decided to investigate Preconstruct as our build tool to prevent these issues in future. They appear to be cropping up more and more lately in Parcel unfortunately :(
